basics.name: Narayan Jangid
basics.label: AI & ML Engineer
basics.summary: Machine Learning Engineer focused on LLMs, VLMs, RAG, and time‑series forecasting; shipped secure, production‑grade GenAI and vision systems.

work.name: Kloudspot
work.summary: Enhancing LISA AI by incorporating multi‑modal generative AI capabilities and delivering end‑to‑end production features.
highlights: Expanded LISA AI with multiple generative AI capabilities (LLMs/VLMs).
Tech stack: Python, Docker, FastAPI, Llama 3.1, Deepseek r1, Qwen, PEFT/LoRA, Finetuning, Text2Mongo.

work.name: Celebal Technologies
work.summary: Designed and deployed AI solutions across RAG, computer vision and predictive analytics on Azure with strong security and observability.
highlights: Led AI solutions using Azure OpenAI and document intelligence to extract, embed and index structured/unstructured data; +15% BLEU and +10% semantic similarity.
Implemented enterprise security with Azure AD, APIM and versioning across AI solutions.
Improved RAG for tabular data; search accuracy 60%→85%; integrated chat history and logging via Azure Cosmos DB.

Built hybrid VLM inference: quantized finetuned model on edge + full finetuned model on cloud; real‑time video analytics pipeline with adaptive edge–cloud switching; achieved 77.9% mAP (YOLO11, QLoRA, PyTorch, SmiolVLM).
Developed predictive analytics for energy demand forecasting using ARIMA/SARIMA, XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost, K‑Means; achieved 75.2% R² for electricity load detection.
Delivered on‑prem OCR using open‑source models and domain finetuning: Microsoft Table Transformer, Tesseract OCR, Layout Parser, Detectron2, ONNX Runtime.

work.name: Celebal Technologies
work.summary: Improved enterprise search pipelines and finetuned LLMs for SQL/NoSQL tasks.
highlights: Enhanced Azure OpenAI RAG for tabular data; accuracy 60%→85%; integrated chat/logging using Azure Cosmos DB.
Finetuned GPT‑3.5‑turbo‑1106 and Mistral‑7B for SQL, NoSQL and Mongo query generation; >95% DataComp score.

work.name: IISER Kolkata — Environmental Nanoscience Lab
work.summary: Quantified estuarine metals and analyzed surface‑groundwater interactions with risk indices and correlation analysis.
highlights: Quantified As/Mn in estuarine compartments; exceeded WHO limits (As 0.01 mg/L, Mn 0.05 mg/L).
Evaluated soil/sediment toxicity and surface‑groundwater interactions.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Kolkata
Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Kolkata

certificates.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate

projects.name: U‑Net Paper Implementation (Medical Imaging)
projects.summary: Implemented U‑Net in PyTorch to segment 512×512 CXR images from a Kaggle pneumonia dataset.
highlights: Dice score 0.87 after 3 epochs with a 23‑layer encoder‑decoder network.
Masked images; batch size 16; Adam lr=0.0001; BCEWithLogitsLoss; local visualization.

projects.name: Deep Convolutional GAN (DCGAN) on MNIST
projects.summary: Built a DCGAN in PyTorch to generate 28×28 MNIST digits from 60k images.
highlights: FID 32.4 after 5 epochs using strided/transposed convolutions.
Batch size 128; Adam lr=0.0002; BCE loss; batch norm; ReLU/LeakyReLU; TensorBoard visualization.
